datastructures

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.Vertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Vertex>

    public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Vertex>
    The class for the graph vertices. Provides functionality for storing information related to that specific vertex.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Vertex that)
        Natural order based on the distance values. Formula: distance + toGoal. Default for toGoal is -1 (ignored if deafult)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Vertex>
        Parameters:
        that - to what this object is compared to.
        Returns:
        -1, 0 or 1.
